title: DF Overlay Patch Notes
notes: + Added DF Profiler scraping for level and EXP
+ Added color picker, font selection, and UI scaling
+ Added toggles for EXP, AVG, ETA, time, and graph
+ Added RAW / AVG3 / AVG5 EXP rate modes
+ Improved EXP smoothing and reset logic
+ Added hunger detection via template matching
+ Added FINE and NOURISHED color states
+ Improved sampling performance and thread stability
+ Added user-controlled icon size in Appearance tab
+ Improved image resizing and icon rendering
+ Added online version check and PID authorization
+ Better UI scaling and font handling
+ Stability fixes and improved hunger sampling
+ Added custom PID login window with Remember PID option
+ Added online patch notes viewer (from website JSON)
+ Separated Next Level and Goal Level rows for cleaner layout
+ Minor UI improvements and bug fixes
